scripts.build: npm run build-web && npm run build-rn && npm run build-dot-flow
scripts.watch-rn: mkdir -p lib-rn/views/ && cp -R src/views/assets lib/views/assets && BABEL_ENV=publish-rn babel -w src -d lib-rn
scripts.watch-web: mkdir -p lib/views/ &&  cp -R src/views/assets lib/views/assets && BABEL_ENV=publish-web babel -w src -d lib
scripts.build-rn: mkdir -p lib-rn/views/ && cp -R src/views/assets lib-rn/views/assets && BABEL_ENV=publish-rn babel src -d lib-rn --ignore __tests__
scripts.build-web: mkdir -p lib/views/ && cp -R src/views/assets lib/views/assets && BABEL_ENV=publish-web babel src -d lib --ignore __tests__
scripts.build-dot-flow: find ./src -name '*.js' -not -path '*/__tests__*' | while read filepath; do cp $filepath `echo $filepath | sed 's/\/src\//\/lib\//g'`.flow && cp $filepath `echo $filepath | sed 's/\/src\//\/lib-rn\//g'`.flow; done
scripts.prepublish: npm run clean && npm run build
